fullDescription.intro: The node can be used to replace GT fields with missing information (./.), that result from merging single-sample vcf files, with a 0/0 genotype and its respective coverage.

option.name: Folder in which Coverage files can be found
File Suffix of Coverage Files which are used to fill ./. GTs

ports.inPort: Cell 0: Path to VCF File with missing GTs
ports.outPort: Path to VCF File with filled GTs
